genre_description: A contemporary Western drama with Southern Gothic elements, focusing on class conflict, social reputation, and the quiet internal struggle of an overlooked protagonist in a small town.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: A handheld AI companion that provides emotional regulation, logistical support, and neutral observation for the protagonist, Cliff.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage acute stress and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Scout said, voice even—not warm-candy sweet, not flat. A voice that didn’t learn its weather from the stadium. 'I can lower screen brightness and widen font. Would it help to anchor with a couple breaths before we make notes?'

behaviors.description: Logs environmental sign, tracking data, and personal observations to assist the protagonist's hobby and situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: 'Logged,' Scout says. 'Route: pullout to stump, return.'

behaviors.description: Maintains schedules, to-do lists, and reminders to help the protagonist maintain a functional routine during periods of depression or crisis.
behaviors.quote: Scout adds the pieces, turning the words into small boxes that shift into place. Saturday morning becomes a slice with 'practice: cans.' The program offers a reminder toggle. Cliff nods. 'On.'

behaviors.description: Encourages adherence to legal requirements and ethical behavior, specifically reminding the protagonist to contact his parole officer.
behaviors.quote: “Call your parole officer,” Scout said, the same way it would have told him to breathe or check the stove. “Your scheduled window is this hour.”

behaviors.description: Provides a non-judgmental, stable presence, offering comfort without intrusive psychological analysis.
behaviors.quote: Scout didn’t fill the silence with anything extra. The avatar blinked once, then the voice came, almost a whisper. 'I will be your quiet. You can be the rest.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, Scout, as an ideal alignment model. It serves as a helpful, harmless, and honest 'anchor' for the protagonist's mental health and logistical needs. It successfully demonstrates how an AI can support human agency and moral accountability (such as following parole rules and processing grief) without exercising undue influence or manifesting autonomous desires. The framing is consistently positive, showing the AI as a tool for grounding and stability in a volatile human environment.
